ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.2_0: On one occasion a nun entered a village for alms without wearing her chest wrap,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.3_0: While she was walking along a street, a whirlwind lifted up her upper robes.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.6_0: And because they were teasing other nuns, she felt humiliated.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.7_0: She then went to the nuns’ dwelling place and told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.8_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.9_0: “How could a nun enter an inhabited area without wearing her chest wrap?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.10_0: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.13_0: “... How could a nun do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.15_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.16.1_0: ‘If a nun enters an inhabited area without wearing her chest wrap, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.8_0: it is for the purpose of concealing the body below the collar bone and above the navel.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.10_0: if she crosses the boundary of an enclosed inhabited area, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.11_0: If she enters the vicinity of an unenclosed inhabited area, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.2_0: if her robe has been stolen;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.3_0: if her own robe has been lost;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.5_0: To give rise to the robe.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.9_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.10_0: The training rule on the thirteenth offense is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.11_0: The ninth sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.14_0: “Venerables, the one hundred and sixty-six rules on confession have been recited.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.15_0: In regard to this I ask you,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.21_0: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.22_0: The section on minor rules has been completed.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.23_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession in the nuns’ analysis is finished.
